mapper.insert: INSERT INTO partial_warehouse_detail ( `key`, partial_id, quantity ) VALUES ( #{key}, #{partial_id}, #{quantity} )
mapper.select: SELECT pwd.key, pwd.partial_id, pwd.quantity, v_partial.code, v_partial.name AS partial_name, pbs.spec_kind, EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM partial_unpack WHERE partial_id = pwd.partial_id) AS unpack_flg FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.key = #{key}

SELECT pwd.key, pwd.partial_id, pwd.quantity, pu.split_quantity, v_partial.code, v_partial.name AS partial_name, pbs.spec_kind FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN partial_unpack pu ON pu.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.key = #{key}

SELECT pbs.spec_kind, SUM(pwd.quantity) AS quantity FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.key = #{key} GROUP BY pbs.spec_kind

SELECT pbs.spec_kind, SUM(CEIL(pwd.quantity / pu.split_quantity)) AS quantity FROM partial_warehouse_detail pwd JOIN partial_unpack pu ON pu.partial_id = pwd.partial_id JOIN v_partial ON pwd.partial_id = v_partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON pbs.spec_kind = v_partial.spec_kind WHERE pwd.key = #{key} GROUP BY pbs.spec_kind

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(pwd.quantity * pbs.collation_on_shelf), 0) FROM (SELECT fact_partial_warehouse.partial_warehouse_key FROM fact_partial_warehouse JOIN af_production_feature ON fact_partial_warehouse.af_pf_key = af_production_feature.af_pf_key WHERE af_production_feature.af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key} GROUP BY fact_partial_warehouse.partial_warehouse_key ) AS fpw JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpw.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key JOIN partial ON pwd.partial_id = partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON partial.spec_kind = pbs.spec_kind

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(pwd.quantity * pbs.unpack),0) FROM (SELECT fact_partial_warehouse.partial_warehouse_key FROM fact_partial_warehouse JOIN af_production_feature ON fact_partial_warehouse.af_pf_key = af_production_feature.af_pf_key WHERE af_production_feature.af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key} GROUP BY fact_partial_warehouse.partial_warehouse_key ) AS fpw JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpw.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key JOIN partial ON pwd.partial_id = partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON partial.spec_kind = pbs.spec_kind

SELECT COALESCE(SUM(pwd.quantity * pbs.off_shelf), 0) FROM (SELECT fact_partial_warehouse.partial_warehouse_key FROM fact_partial_warehouse JOIN af_production_feature ON fact_partial_warehouse.af_pf_key = af_production_feature.af_pf_key WHERE af_production_feature.af_pf_key = #{af_pf_key} GROUP BY fact_partial_warehouse.partial_warehouse_key ) AS fpw JOIN partial_warehouse_detail pwd ON fpw.partial_warehouse_key = pwd.key JOIN partial ON pwd.partial_id = partial.partial_id JOIN partial_bussiness_standard pbs ON partial.spec_kind = pbs.spec_kind
